text: Michele Frangilli is an Italian archer. He was born on 1 May 1976. Frangilli competed at the 1996 Summer Olympics, 2000 Summer Olympics, 2004 Summer Olympics, and the 2012 Summer Olympics.Michele FrangilliMichele FRANGILLI == References == Category:1976 births Category:Living people Category:Italian archers Category:Olympic gold medalists for Italy Category:Olympic silver medalists for Italy Category:Olympic bronze medalists for Italy Category:Sportspeople from Lombardy
title: Michele Frangilli
